gw.plugin.document.impl

Class BFOMergeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guidewire.pl.system.cluster.ForwardingProxyBase
      • gw.plugin.document.impl.BFOMergeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, IPDFMergeHandler, InitializablePlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public class BFOMergeHandler
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.cluster.ForwardingProxyBase
implements IPDFMergeHandler, InitializablePlugin
    Stock implementation of IPDFMergeHandler. This implementation uses the BFO PDF merge library to perform creation of PDF documents from templates. The library can be used both licensed and unlicensed; if the license key is not supplied then "DEMO" will appear on all of the generated documents. This implementation can also be configured to run only on the batch server, which would mean that only one license would be required, as opposed to one per server.
    Author:
    bjohnson

      • doPDFMerge

        public byte[] doPDFMerge(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                java.lang.String[] names,
                java.lang.String[] values)
        Merge the indicated values into the template identified by the given templateDescriptor, based on the given form field names. If the BatchServerOnly parameter is set to True, then this code will cause the actual merge to be performed on the batch server and the results returned to the local server. Otherwise the merge will be done locally.
        Specified by:
        doPDFMerge in interface IPDFMergeHandler
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based
        names - The names of the fields whose values will be set by the merge code
        values - The values to be used in the merge
        Returns:
        The completed document, as a byte array

      • doRemotePDFMerge

        public byte[] doRemotePDFMerge(java.lang.String templateID,
                      ILocale locale,
                      java.lang.String[] names,
                      java.lang.String[] values)
        Remote endpoint for a forward call from one server to the batch server to perform a PDF merge
        Parameters:
        templateID - The ID of the template on which the document will be based
        locale - locale for the document. Null for default
        names - The names of the fields whose values will be set by the merge code
        values - The values to be used in the merge
        Returns:
        The completed document, as a byte array
